jobDescription: We are now hiring a Senior System Software Engineer.  NVIDIA is looking for a world-class engineer to join its GPU Resource Manager team. Our offerings to the automotive industry begin with navigation and infotainment systems, back seat entertainment systems, instrument clusters and move into the exciting field of autonomous computing, deep neural networks and self-driving cars. Our team plays a vital role in realizing the vision behind these products by building core technologies and platform solutions that are not only competitive but industry-first.
